title: Super Mario Bros Movie Sequel Officially Announced - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.11.24
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://factormeals.com/kindafunny50 and use code kindafunny50 to get 50% off.

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:25 - Housekeeping
 - In case you missed it, a new Game Showdown is live and it’s a video game spelling bee. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
 - Kung Fu Panda 4 in review is up on Youtube.com/KindaFunny
 - I’m streaming all three GB Movies today!
 - The Mix and Kinda Funny have teamed up for the Spring Game Showcase! 60 indies will strut their stuff FRIDAY at 10 am PT (that’s the usual KFGD time). Come watch on our channels, the mix channels, IGN, or GameSpot!
        -  The Roper Report   -
00:13:48 - Everything Nintendo Announced On Mario Day 2024
00:23:29 - Deviation Games Is Shut Down
00:38:03 - Xbox’s Sea of Thieves has topped PlayStation 5 digital pre-order charts
00:47:45 - Activision QA Workers Vote to Form Largest US Video Game Worker Union to Date
00:50:35 - Wee News!
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Bless
